parts.text:
```json
{
"application": "Speech Recognition",
"software": [
"PyTorch",
"MLPerf",
"NCCL",
"PMIX"
],
"resource_requirements": [
"DGX System",
"SLURM",
"Docker",
"Lustre",
"NVIDIA GPUs"
],
"details": {
"DGXSYSTEM": "Environment variable specifying the DGX system",
"CONT": "Container image to be used for running the application",
"NEXP": "Number of experiments to run",
"DATESTAMP": "Timestamp for logging purposes",
"CLEAR_CACHES": "Flag to clear caches before each experiment",
"DATADIR": "Directory for the dataset",
"LOGDIR": "Directory for storing logs",
"API_LOG_DIR": "Directory for storing API logs",
"SEED": "Random seed for the experiment",
"WALLTIME_DRYRUN": "Dry run walltime",
"METADATA_DIR": "Directory for metadata",
"TIME_TAGS": "Flag to enable time tagging",
"NVTX_FLAG": "Flag to enable NVIDIA Nsight Systems profiling",
"NCCL_TEST": "Flag to run NCCL performance test",
"SYNTH_DATA": "Flag to use synthetic data",
"EPOCH_PROF": "Flag to enable epoch profiling"
}
}
```
